about_the_game:
SUPER YODELLAND: Legend of the Katzenbär, is a nice 2D-Jump-'n'-Run video game for everyone of all ages.
Focused on exploring an alpine world full of mysteries.

THE STORY

Bert’s failed school project about rocket science caused heavy environmental pollution all over the forest.
Intent to clean up on his own, Bert set out to the forest.
Unfortunately there was a mysterious spirit creature spotted, locally known as the legendary “Katzenbär”.

RUN

No matter if uphill or downhill, you never run out of breath.

JUMP

Jumping is crucial to make way in the rough terrain of Yodelland.
Bert can even “DOUBLEJUMP” by pressing the “JUMP-Button” twice, right from the start.

PARAGLIDE

After performing the “DOUBLEJUMP” and pressing the “JUMP-Button” a third time in the air, Bert activates his ultra portable PARAGLIDER to glide smoothly to the ground.

Yodel

Yodeling is the primary way to interact with citizens of Yodelland and you probably break some stones with it.

  • violence-free gameplay
  • no boring text boxes
  • classic platformer gameplay with a sense of adventure
  • easy to access controls
  • an unique art style

Focused on exploring an alpine world full of mysteries.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or later
  • Processor: Intel Core™ Duo or faster
  • Memory: 200 MB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.12 Sierra
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @2.7Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 640M, AMD Radeon HD 5750, Intel HD Graphics 6100
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad highly recommended.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: i5-2500k@3.3GHz, AMD FX 6300 3.5GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750, AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Gamepad highly recommended.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
